1e3 + 1.0 = 1001.000000
1e8 + 1.0 = 100000000.000000
1e8 + 4.0 = 100000000.000000
1e8 + 5.0 = 100000008.000000
double: 1e8 + 1.0 = 100000001.000000
double: 1e16 + 1.0 = 10000000000000000.000000
x = 2.00000000000000000000000000000000
x_clone = 2.00000000000000000000000000000000

x = 0.2500000000000000
x_wannabe = 0.2500000000000000
x = 0.25000000000000000000000000000000
x_wannabe = 0.25000000000000000000000000000000

x = 0.2000000029802322
x_wannabe = 0.1999999880790710
x = 0.20000000298023223876953125000000
x_wannabe = 0.19999998807907104492187500000000

Don't use == to compare floats!

(a + b) + c = 100183496.00000000000000000000000000000000
a + (b + c) = 100183504.00000000000000000000000000000000

0.12345679104328155517578125000000
0.12345679104328155517578125000000

0.12345678899999999733605449137031
0.12345678901234567736988623209982

Max float = 3.40282346638528859811704183484517e+38

d = 2.00000000000000000000000000000000e+10, f = 2.00000000000000000000000000000000e+10
d = 1.99999999999999997817412236428184e+145, f = inf

inf
-inf
-nan
nan
+infinity = inf
-infinity = -inf
NaN = nan
10 * 0.5 + 3 + NaN = nan
NaN == NaN: false
isnan(NaN): true
